meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the January 24, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize an optional child-care facilities exemption
agenda_items.description: Authorize an optional child-care facilities exemption of 50 percent for qualifying child-care facilities as defined in the Texas Tax Code beginning with the 2024 tax year.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of General Obligation Refunding Bonds
agenda_items.description: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, General Obligation Refunding Bonds, Series 2024A in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $55,000,000.00.

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the appointment of members to the College Advisory Commission
Authorize an amendment to the Other Transaction Agreement with the FAA
agenda_items.description: Authorize an amendment to the Other Transaction Agreement with the FAA in connection with the Rehabilitation of Taxiway A.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 7A, Anti-Litter Regulations
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 7A, Anti-Litter Regulations, of the Dallas City Code.

agenda_items.title: Authorize preliminary adoption of Substantial Amendment No. 3 to the FY 2023-24 Action Plan
agenda_items.description: Authorize preliminary adoption of Substantial Amendment No. 3 to the FY 2023-24 Action Plan for the Community Development Block Grant Funds.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Resolution of Support for Generation Housing Partners, LLC
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Resolution of Support for Generation Housing Partners, LLC related to its application for 9% Housing Tax Credits.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Resolution of Support for O-SDA Industries, LLC
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Resolution of Support for O-SDA Industries, LLC related to its application for 9% Housing Tax Credits.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Resolution of Support for Palladium USA International, Inc.
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Resolution of Support for Palladium USA International, Inc. related to its application for 2024 9% Low Income Housing Tax Credits.

financial_items.description: Estimated Annual Revenue Foregone for child-care facilities exemption
